channel.title: Needing a coder and a hoster for my server
channel.description:
i need a coder that will be able to help me code a lost isle base because its too hard for me but umm if you are a good coder i will need to see some proof maybe a server you have released (not leeched) i did not code this server i just downloaded if i do select you to become my coder you will be co owner i would like a client also
for the hoster, the hoster will get admin i will have a copy of server just in case u quit or something your job will be easy keep server up 24/7 and have a good computer (your first project should be easy just add in some items that work good and change the stats of them)
specs of server well heres the link to see some pics and so on http://google.com/forums/showthread.php?t=19875&highlight=lost+isle (change google to run3 l0cus change the 3 to an e and the 0 to an o no space)
anti dupe anti syi anti multi login
this is considered server help

but umm if you are a good coder i will need to see some proof maybe a server you have released (not leeched)
i did not code this server i just downloaded
if i do select you to become my coder you will be co owner
i would like a client also

for the hoster, the hoster will get admin i will have a copy of server just in case u quit or something
your job will be easy
keep server up 24/7 and have a good computer
(your first project should be easy just add in some items that work good and change the stats of them)

specs of server
well heres the link to see some pics and so on
http://google.com/forums/showthread.php?t=19875&highlight=lost+isle
(change google to run3 l0cus change the 3 to an e and the 0 to an o no space)

anti dupe
anti syi
anti multi login

this is considered server help[/quote]

So basicly you want someone else coding the server, then have someone else host it while you take credit for it?

Learn2Java
